name: everyric2-ae
description: Everyric2 After Effects Plugin - Automatic lyrics synchronization

scripts.watch: npm run watch:panel & npm run watch:jsx
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run install-plugin
scripts.release: npm run build && rm -rf release && mkdir -p release/com.everyric.ae && cp -r CSXS dist css lib release/com.everyric.ae/ && cp index.html .debug release/com.everyric.ae/
